00016 #ifndef FW_MESH_COOKER_H
00017 #define FW_MESH_COOKER_H 1
00018 
00019 #include "NxPhysics.h"
00020 
00021 class ConvexMesh;
00022 void makeFwConvex(NxU8 *addr, const ConvexMesh *mesh);
00023 
00024 #ifdef DEFINE_CONVEX_COOKER 
00025 //#include "PhysicsSDK.h"
00026 #include "Physics.h"
00027 #include "TriangleMesh.h"
00028 #include "TriangleMeshShape.h"
00029 #include "ConvexMesh.h"
00030 #include "ConvexShape.h"
00031 #include "Scene.h"
00032 // #include "Stream.h"
00033 #include "ConvexHull.h"
00034 #include "ConvexMesh.h"
00035 #include "fw-mesh-utils.h"
00036 #include "fw-convex.h"
00037 
00038 
00039 // convex is required to be at least MAX_FWCONVEX_SIZE
00040 
00041 void makeFwConvex(NxU8 *convex, const ConvexMesh *mesh)
00042 {
00043     NxU32 i,j;
00044 
00045     NxU32 nVerts = ((ConvexMeshRuntime *)mesh)->GetNbVerts();
00046     NxU32 nFaces = ((ConvexMeshRuntime *)mesh)->GetNbPolygons();
00047     NxU32 nEdges = nVerts + nFaces - 2;
00048 
00049     ASSERT(nVerts <= FW_MAX_CONVEX_VERT);
00050     ASSERT(nFaces <= FW_MAX_CONVEX_FACE);
00051 
00052     // Allocate memory
00053 
00054     fw_convex_shape *shape = (fw_convex_shape *) convex;
00055     shape->numVerts = nVerts;
00056     shape->numFaces = nFaces;
00057 
00058     shape->centroid = FwV3(0,0,0);
00059     FwV3 bbMin = FwV3(FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX,FLT_MAX);
00060     FwV3 bbMax = FwV3(-FLT_MAX,-FLT_MAX,-FLT_MAX);
00061 
00062     // Copy verts
00063 
00064     FwV3 *verts         = getConvexVerts(convex);
00065     for (i = 0; i < nVerts; i++)
00066     {
00067         verts[i] = *(FwV3 *)&(((ConvexMeshRuntime *)mesh)->GetVerts()[i]);
00068         shape->centroid += verts[i];
00069         bbMin = bbMin.min(verts[i]);
00070         bbMax = bbMax.max(verts[i]);
00071     }
00072 
00073     shape->centroid /= (NxReal)nVerts;
00074     shape->bbCentre = (bbMin + bbMax)/2;
00075     shape->bbRadius = (bbMax - bbMin)/2;
00076 
00077     fw_convex_face *faces   = getConvexFaces(convex);
00078     fw_convex_loop *loops   = getConvexLoops(convex);
00079 
00080     // Copy faces
00081 
00082     NxU32 loopIndex = 0;
00083     for (i = 0; i < nFaces; i++)
00084     {
00085         const PxHullPolygonData & Poly = ((ConvexMeshRuntime *)mesh)->GetPolygon(i);
00086 
00087         faces[i].plane.n = *(FwV3 *)&Poly.mPlane[0];
00088         faces[i].plane.d = Poly.mPlane[3];
00089         faces[i].loopIndex = loopIndex;
00090         faces[i].numVerts = Poly.mNbVerts;
00091 
00092         FwV3 fn = (verts[Poly.mVRef8[1]]-verts[Poly.mVRef8[0]]).cross(verts[Poly.mVRef8[2]]-verts[Poly.mVRef8[1]]);
00093 
00094 
00095         // Copy loops such that cross product of successive faces is always outward facing
00096 
00097         if(fn.dot(faces[i].plane.n)>0)
00098         {
00099             for (j = 0; j < Poly.mNbVerts; j++)
00100             {
00101                 loops[loopIndex].vIndex = Poly.mVRef8[j];
00102                 loops[loopIndex].eIndex = static_cast<u8> (Poly.mERef16[j]);  // TODO: cull parallel edges
00103                 loopIndex++;
00104             }
00105         }
00106         else
00107         {
00108             for (j = 0; j < Poly.mNbVerts; j++)
00109             {
00110                 loops[loopIndex].vIndex = Poly.mVRef8[Poly.mNbVerts-1-j];
00111                 loops[loopIndex].eIndex = static_cast<u8> (Poly.mERef16[Poly.mNbVerts-1-j]);  // TODO: cull parallel edges
00112                 loopIndex++;
00113             }
00114         }
00115     }
00116 
00117     NxReal normErr = 0;
00118     for(i=0;i<nFaces;i++)
00119     {
00120         fw_convex_loop *loop        = loops + faces[i].loopIndex;
00121         NxU8            v0          = loop[faces[i].numVerts-1].vIndex;
00122         NxU8            v1;
00123 
00124         for(j=0; j<faces[i].numVerts; j++, v0=v1)
00125         {
00126             v1 = loop[j].vIndex;
00127             FwV3 e = (verts[v1]-verts[v0]).unit();
00128             NxReal k = fabs(faces[i].plane.n.dot(e));
00129             if(k>normErr)
00130                 normErr = k;
00131         }
00132     }
00133 
00134 //  printf("********** Normal error %f\n",normErr);
00135 
00136 
00137     /* fill in per-edge face info - somewhat clunky */
00138 
00139     NxU8 *edgeTable = (NxU8 *) _alloca(nEdges * 2 * 3);
00140     NxU8 *edgePtr = edgeTable;
00141 
00142     for(i=0;i<nFaces;i++)
00143     {
00144         fw_convex_loop *loop        = loops + faces[i].loopIndex;
00145         NxU8            v0          = loop[faces[i].numVerts-1].vIndex;
00146         NxU8            v1;
00147 
00148         for(j=0; j<faces[i].numVerts; j++, v0=v1)
00149         {
00150             v1 = loop[j].vIndex;
00151             *edgePtr++ = v0;
00152             *edgePtr++ = v1;
00153             *edgePtr++ = i;
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157 
00158     for(i=0;i<nFaces;i++)
00159     {
00160         fw_convex_loop *loop        = loops + faces[i].loopIndex;
00161         NxU8            v0          = loop[faces[i].numVerts-1].vIndex;
00162         NxU8            v1;
00163 
00164         for(j=0; j<faces[i].numVerts; j++, v0=v1)
00165         {
00166             NxU32 k;
00167             v1 = loop[j].vIndex;
00168             for(k=0;k<nEdges*2 && !(edgeTable[k*3]==v1 && edgeTable[k*3+1]==v0); k++);
00169             assert(k!=nEdges*2);
00170             loop[j].adjFace = edgeTable[k*3+2];
00171         }
00172     }
00173 
00174     {
00175         shape->ofsLoops = static_cast<u16> ((sizeof(fw_convex_shape) + sizeof(fw_convex_face) * nFaces) >> 2);
00176         shape->ofsVerts = shape->ofsLoops +
00177                     static_cast<u8> ((sizeof(fw_convex_loop) * nEdges * 2) >> 2);
00178         shape->cSize = shape->ofsVerts + ((12 * shape->numVerts) >> 2);
00179         shape->cSize = (shape->cSize + 7) & ~7;
00180     }
00181 }
00182 
00183 #endif
00184 #endif
